**Opinion: China Tariffs Are Coming. Beijing's Response Could Be a New Currency War.**
As Asia prepares for the potential impact of a new Trump administration, Pan Gongsheng, the governor of the People's Bank of China, will face significant challenges in navigating the economic shocks that President-elect Donald Trump has threatened. Trump's plans, including 60% tariffs on Chinese goods and a weaker dollar, could lead to a currency devaluation by China on a scale the global financial system has never encountered. Residents are being asked to conserve water, with the city's fire department warning that an open fire hydrant can release over 1,000 gallons per minute. 'One of the attributes that is starting to come out (with climate change) is these rapid transitions from either very wet periods to very dry periods, or very dry periods to very wet periods,' said Brian Fuchs, a climatologist at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln.

Sunday River ski resort in Maine announced that it will open for the 2024-25 ski season on Thursday, two weeks before Thanksgiving. As stated on the Sunday River website, 'We are so stoked to welcome everyone back to your happy place.'

Several ski resorts in Europe are opening their doors earlier than usual for the 2024/2025 season.
